# ldesign-swiper-slide



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

ldesign-swiper-slide
- Swiper 的子项容器，支持 active 状态用于样式控制

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `active` | `active`  | 激活态（由父级 ldesign-swiper 控制） | `boolean` | `false` |
